planLimit.warning: You have reached your plan's property limit.
planLimit.exploreNote: You can explore the wizard, but you'll need to upgrade your plan to generate.

step1.title: Your property
step1.subtitle: Tell us the basics. We'll take care of the rest.
step1.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of the accommodation. If left blank, it will be generated automatically.
step1.noCoordinates: No coordinates detected. Select an option from the dropdown to get local recommendations.
step1.checkInInstructionsPlaceholder: Describe step by step how the guest enters. E.g.: When you arrive at the building entrance, press button 3B. Take the elevator to the 3rd floor. The apartment door is the first one on the left...
step1.checkInInstructionsHint: The more detailed, the better. The AI will use exactly what you write here for the check-in section.

host.title: Manager / Host
host.subtitle: This information will appear in the manual so guests can contact you.
host.photoHint: Upload a photo of yourself or the property manager. Guests will see this photo in the manual and feel more at ease.
host.fullNamePlaceholder: Your name or the manager's name

step2.title: Property details
step2.subtitle: Information only you know. Most of it is just quick clicks.

access.title: Property access
access.lockboxCodePlaceholder: Will be sent before your arrival
access.lockboxLocationPlaceholder: E.g.: To the right of the main door
access.doorCodePlaceholder: Will be sent before your arrival
access.codeChanges: Does the code change per booking?
access.codeChangesYes: Yes, it's sent with each booking
access.meetingPoint: Where do you meet the guest?
access.latePlan: If the guest arrives late, what's the backup plan?
access.latePlanLockboxPlaceholder: Code and location of the emergency lockbox
access.latePlanNeighborPlaceholder: Name and floor of the neighbor / doorman

hotWater.title: Hot water
hotWater.type: What type of hot water system does it have?

electrical.title: Electrical panel
electrical.locationPlaceholder: E.g.: In the hallway, right-side cabinet

support.title: Guest support
support.emergencyPhone: 24h emergency phone (if different from the main one)
support.emergencyPhonePlaceholder: Leave blank if it's the same as the host's phone

recycling.title: Trash and recycling
recycling.containers: Where are the nearest recycling bins?
recycling.containersPlaceholder: E.g.: Corner of Main St. and Sun St., 50 meters away

recommendations.title: Your recommendations
recommendations.label: What places do you recommend to your guests?
recommendations.placeholder: E.g.: Nou Manolin, Madness Coffee Shop, Bar La Fabrica, Central Market...
recommendations.hint: Write the names of restaurants, cafes, bars, or activities you recommend. The AI will group them by category and generate descriptions.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.instructionsPlaceholder: Describe what the guest must do before leaving. E.g.: Leave towels in the bathtub, take the trash to the bins on the corner, close all windows, turn off the AC, put the keys in the lockbox...
checkout.instructionsHint: Write everything the guest needs to know for departure. The AI will use this text.
checkout.keyReturn: What does the guest do with the keys when leaving?
checkout.keyReturnHandPlaceholder: Where and to whom do they hand over the keys?
checkout.luggage: Can guests leave luggage after checkout?
checkout.luggageConsignaPlaceholder: Name or address of the luggage storage

items.title: Where are things?
items.subtitle: Toggle what you have and specify where it is. This feeds the chatbot so it can answer guests.
items.ironPlaceholder: E.g.: Left wardrobe in the bedroom

step2.translationNotice: All this information will be automatically translated into English and French in your manual.

step3.title: Upload photos and videos of your property
step3.subtitle: Record how each appliance works, the different areas of the property, the parking... The AI will <1>automatically detect</1> what's in each file and create instructions for your guests.
step3.selectZone: Select a zone to upload or drag below
step3.dragHere: Or drag photos and videos here
step3.autoDetect: The AI will detect the zone automatically
step3.tipText: Record short videos (10-30 sec) showing how each appliance works: microwave, washing machine, dishwasher, TV, air conditioning... You can select a zone above to upload directly, or drag files and the AI will detect the zone automatically.

errors.videoTooLarge: "{{name}}" ({{size}}MB) exceeds the {{max}}MB limit. Trim or compress the video before uploading.

step4.title: Review your manual
step4.subtitle: This is the content your manual will have. Review each section, edit what you need, and approve.
step4.autoTranslate: It will be automatically translated into English and French.
step4.infoBanner: These sections will be created automatically with the detected content. You can then edit them, add additional steps, and rearrange them from the zone editor.
step4.mediaInstructions: Content with usage instructions will be generated.
step4.mediaInstructionsEach: Content with usage instructions will be generated for each item.
step4.zoneDetected: Zone detected in the uploaded photos/videos. Content will be generated automatically.

step5.timeoutError: Generation took too long. Please try again.

upgrade.title: You have reached your plan's property limit
upgrade.subtitle: Upgrade your plan to create more properties with AI.
